title: A Few More T206 For Sale (Graded)
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: A Few More T206 For Sale (Graded)
posts.post_content:
F/S T206 Graded - the "Q-Z" list I noted from the last post, more like "R-T".  Many have sold already, but there are a few more listed here.  Not previously listed - all prices include delivery.  Paypal (payment owed), check or MO.  PM or Email, scans avail upon request but first buy commitment takes.  

Thank you for your time and interest!

*Ritter SGC60 - SC 350 - $75
*Rudolph SGC30 - Tolstoi - $45 **SOLD**
*F Smith (F Smith on front) SGC30 - Pied 150 - $30
*Al Shaw SGC20 - EPDG - $40 (clean/no crease - slight paper loss back only) **SOLD**
*Slagle BVG 4.5 - SC 350 - $50 **SOLD**
*Ira Thomas SGC40 - SC 350 - $30
*Theilman BVG4 - Pied 350 - $50 **SOLD**
My apologies!  I left that one in error - it was sold.  I've taken it out.
